metadata.title: CVE-2016-5421 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in libcurl before 7.50.1 allows attackers tocontrol which connection is used or possibly have unspecified other impactvia unknown vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5421` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.1
libcurl3 - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.1
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.1
libcurl3-nss - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: curl package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.47.0-1ubuntu2.1').
